text: Helsingborgs IF had a resurgence season on the domestic scene, finishing in the top four once again. With Henrik Larsson having his best season following his return, the side was able to compensate for the loss of Razak Omotoyossi to Saudi Arabia. The 4th place finish meant Helsingborg qualified for Europe once more. The year started with a defeat to PSV Eindhoven in the Last 32 of the UEFA Cup, the best performance from a Swedish club for some time. For results of the run see the 2007 article. ==Squad== ===Goalkeepers=== * Daniel Andersson * Oscar Berglund ===Defenders=== * Adama Tamboura * Andreas Landgren * Samir Beloufa * Christoffer Andersson
